about_the_game:
This is a spoof plot puzzle game. Click the dialogue to advance the plot. There are many puzzle-solving levels in the game. You can find props by exploring and solve puzzles according to the game prompts.
The game continues the game setting and gameplay of Sufferer Rescue Center 3.

The story of the new game tells the story of the protagonist Zhang Ji continuing to search for the key prop mobile phone without the client. The game has multiple main lines, and all the main lines converge on the main line of the mobile phone. What kind of new fetters will all the characters have next? How will the protagonist solve these problems, and who is behind this time? Stay tuned!

The game adopts a dynamic comic performance method, with rich pictures and simple gameplay, combined with mini-game puzzle-solving gameplay, the overall story plot is humorous and contains many popular hot spots. If you are familiar with Internet culture, you will like this series of works more.
